Appendix B

INTERIM. REPORT

‘A CONTINUING CRITICAL REVIEW OF MAJOR FACTORS IN STATISTICAL

STUDIES IN THE AREA OF SMOKING AND HEALTH

January, 1982.

T.D. Sterling Limited

Appendix B INTERIM. REPORT ‘ A CONTINUING CRITICAL inspection OF MAJOR FACTORS IN STATISTICAL study IN THE AREA OF smoke AND wellness ‘ Theodor D. Sterling, Ph scale. D. January, 1982. T. D. Sterling Limited
summary: Theodor D. Sterling, Ph.D. published a report on the effects of smoking on health in 1982. The report was published in the journal ‘Science’. It was the first report of its kind to look at the effect of smoke on human health and well-being.
